# FileManager.URLRelationship.same

**Case**

The directory and the item are the same. This relationship occurs when the value of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLResourceKey/fileResourceIdentifierKey] is the same for the directory and item.

## Declaration

```swift
case same
```

## URL Relationships

- **FileManager.URLRelationship.contains**: The directory contains the specified item.
- **FileManager.URLRelationship.other**: The directory does not contain the item and is not the same as the item.

items.description: The directory contains the specified item.
items.name: FileManager.URLRelationship.contains

items.description: The directory does not contain the item and is not the same as the item.
items.name: FileManager.URLRelationship.other

title: FileManager.URLRelationship.same
